name: Kara
text: It was great in every way. We want to stay long... If we come to marrakech again, we will definitely stay here again.

name: Alice
text: Yousine was at the reception when I arrived, and he was very helpful. The location on Google maps was correct, but I just walked by the riad, so he was helpful in sending a pin. The room was very comfortable, and the breakfast was a great start to the day. I especially liked the terrace - it was a great spot to unwind after a day of exploring.

name: Ulla-maia
text: Beautiful, stylish and very clean, great food. Friendly and caring staff. Unfortunately, due to covid restrictions, we had to leave earlier than planned. When the world returns to normal, we will be back, wonderful Morocco and Marrakesh! In the meantime, stay healthy!

name: Amy
text: the place is very beautiful and welcoming. The staff was so eager to please, patient and helpful. the spa was just what we needed with a great hammam, massage and facial. worth every penny!

name: José
text: Everything was very good, the accommodation, the breakfast, the staff and the Riad decoration. The Riad courtyard is really pretty and well decorated. It was what I liked most.

name: Carolina
text: It's a beautifully decorated, central and quiet hotel, great staff, good food and nice terraces in the sun. Will be back!

name: Ambot
text: staff kindness, clean and beautiful place

name: Emma
text: Breakfast, staff, room - BEAUTIFUL! really fab place to stay… relaxing vibe, dinner and drinks available … lovely but not over bearing ❤️❤️❤️
